concept.title: SGSN support for IPPS enhancements (Feature f52047-02)
concept.shortdesc: With this feature, the IPPS functionality is enhanced to improve the reliability and performance.

conbody.p: If the PAPS is facing unstable connectivity with the certain IPPS. This IPPS is excluded from the selection rule when a new PDP is established.
After the IPPS recovery is done, if a downlink packet is received, the subscriber is paged in order to re-establish the RAB that was released due to the IPPS restart.

When the IPPS receives an error indication, the IPPS understands which PAPS is serving a PDP based on the endpoint IP and TEID. So the IPPS sends the error indication to the appropriate serving PAPS VM for the necessary handling, instead of broadcasting that to all the PAPS VMs.
This feature can also resolve the IPPS restarts when enabling GTP user plane echoes.
